creator: XOX Media
descriptionHtml:
It’s everything XOX BLACK on your fingertips.

Manage all your XOX BLACK – and ONEXOX prepaid subline accounts from anywhere, and in style. Pay your bill in seconds, track data on the go, subscribe data for your subline, share Season Pass, and so much more.

Features include:

The Homepage

All you need to know about your data, plan, and bill right on the dashboard. Shortcuts to all your favourite features just a click away.


Season Pass Hub

Your Season Pass control center. Clearly see how much data, voice and SMS you have, how to get more the second you need it and easily share it to your sublines whenever you want.


Plan Management

Review and manage all your plans, sublines and favourite numbers from anywhere. Easily subscribe to data for your family and friends – whether they are on BLACK or ONEXOX Prepaid at any time right from the palm of your hand.


Simplified Bill

A clear and simple bill that explains what’s changed from month to month. Understand and pay your bill with just a few taps.


One app. Total control.


Download the XOX BLACK app today!
descriptionShort: Manage all your XOX BLACK in style. Pay your bill in seconds and data on the go.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
XOX Mobile would like to wish all our subscribers SELAMAT HARI RAYA!
Although movement around is restricted, we are not passing up the chance to e-celebrate the festive season with YOU!
Experience the brand-new Hari Raya design for the Black app and may the joy of this festive season light our lives with love, peace, and hope.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Due to popular requests, this update comes with purchase history of users to help them track their DB Plan top up and Add on data purchases. More types of products will also be available for purchase through the XOX eWallet with this update!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Introducing the BLACK APP 2.1 RELEASE! Apart from UIUX enhancements and fixes, this update includes many new features to streamline our onboarding process for subscribers. Users can now activate their new SIM card, check their account status, receive exclusive onboarding offers via the Black app, and many more.

Note: Due to the inclusion of SIM Activation feature on Black app, additional permissions for the app may be required from all users.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: With the BLACK APP 2.2.1 release, XOX subscribers are now able to utilize their collected loyalty points to redeem Data Add ons! appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The BLACK APP 2.2.6 release introduces the ONG LAI giveaway campaign that provides daily rewards for our users to win for FREE! What do I have to do then, you say? Simple. Just log in to your Black app daily and stand a chance to win rewards throughout the month of February.

During this festive period, XOX would like to wish all our users a Happy and Prosperous Chinese New Year! Stay safe and stay home.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Introducing ADX (Action Driven eXchanges)! This new feature on the Black App enables users to earn ADX Points. Use your ADX Points to redeem amazing rewards on our rewards catalogue. ADX is here to allow users to experience a new way of earning on the XOX ecology.

Watch Videos > Earn ADX Points > Redeem Rewards

Its that simple. So what are you waiting for? Try ADX today!

descriptionShort: Manage all your XOX BLACK in style. Pay your bill in seconds and data on the go.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The BLACK App 2.2.15 release introduces XOX’s JomBantu initiative. This initiative provides our users with the opportunity to give back to the community and the less fortunate. Users will be able to donate their internet data to poor students who cannot afford to attend online classes.

Thinking of making a change during these trying times? Donate your data today and you may actually change the life of someone in need.

title: XOX BLACK

creator: XOX Media
descriptionHtml:
It’s everything XOX BLACK on your fingertips.

Manage all your XOX BLACK – and ONEXOX prepaid subline accounts from anywhere, and in style. Pay your bill in seconds, track data on the go, subscribe data for your subline, share Season Pass, and so much more.

Features include:

The Homepage

All you need to know about your data, plan, and bill right on the dashboard. Shortcuts to all your favourite features just a click away.


Season Pass Hub

Your Season Pass control center. Clearly see how much data, voice and SMS you have, how to get more the second you need it and easily share it to your sublines whenever you want.


Plan Management

Review and manage all your plans, sublines and favourite numbers from anywhere. Easily subscribe to data for your family and friends – whether they are on BLACK or ONEXOX Prepaid at any time right from the palm of your hand.


Simplified Bill

A clear and simple bill that explains what’s changed from month to month. Understand and pay your bill with just a few taps.


One app. Total control.


Download the XOX BLACK app today!
descriptionShort: Manage all your XOX BLACK in style. Pay your bill in seconds and data on the go.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New interactive tutorial to guide users on better utilising the Black App
Easily identify contacts who are BLACK App Users when sharing Season Pass & Softpins Bug fixes and improvements

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improved user security enhancements:
- Sign on to XOX services using one account
- Strengthened security and protection through user verification
- Additional security features (editable security credentials)

In our efforts to ensure the best security measures:
- All returning users will be required to set up a new password
- All users will be required to verify their email

title: XOX BLACK

creator: XOX Media
descriptionHtml:
BLACK App Super App is the go-to Super App to manage your XOX account, shop online & earn exclusive rewards! It’s everything on your fingertips.

Features include:

The New Home
Stay in the know about the latest events happening on the BLACK App home page! Access to your favourite features is now just a click away.

Activity Tab
Track your activities across all services in one place. Clearly see the details of every transaction on the BLACK App - customise a specific period or select your mobile number choice to view the transactions!

XOX Mobile
Review and manage all your plans, sublines, and favourite numbers on the XOX Mobile service. Easily subscribe to data for your family and friends at any time – whether they are on BLACK or ONEXOX Prepaid.

One app. Total control.
Download the BLACK App Super App now!
descriptionShort: Manage all your XOX BLACK in style. Pay your bill in seconds and data on the go.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
What’s New:

The new BLACK App Super App is for all.

Access to latest deals and promotions of your favourite XOX service.

Track all your activities and transactions in one place.

Stay up to date with Your Line summary.

descriptionHtml:
BLACK App Super App is the go-to Super App to manage your XOX account, shop online & earn exclusive rewards! It’s everything on your fingertips.

Features include:

The New Home
Stay in the know about the latest events happening on the BLACK App home page! Access to your favourite features is now just a click away.

Activity Tab
Track your activities across all services in one place. Clearly see the details of every transaction on the BLACK App - customise a specific period or select your mobile number choice to view the transactions!

XOX Mobile
Review and manage all your plans, sublines, and favourite numbers on the XOX Mobile service. Easily subscribe to data for your family and friends at any time – whether they are on BLACK or ONEXOX Prepaid.

One app. Total control.
Download the BLACK App Super App now!
descriptionShort: Manage all your XOX BLACK in style. Pay your bill in seconds and data on the go.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. General bug fixes
2. Enhancement on page display
